name: Andrew Anderson
review: Thankful for this local community following Christ in Manassas! The church family is welcoming, the preaching is expository, the worship is Christ-centered, and overall the attitude is one of hope and joy. Come and hear the Gospel preached and lived!

name: Jennifer Glenn
review: Lovely, thoughtful and engaging, gospel-focused worship with excellent expository preaching.  A very warm, welcoming community.

name: Matthew Holloway
review: Loving congregation, instantly felt welcomedâ€¦ great structure and preaching!
